article_title: Former Fairview star Sam Martin catches four TDs for Miami (Ohio)
article_text:
Former Fairview football star Sam Martin had quite the day for Miami (Ohio) Saturday.

The freshman wide receiver caught eight passes for 111 yards and four touchdowns, helping the Redhawks come back from a 27-point deficit to win 42-41 over Massachusetts.

Martin set Colorado’s high school records for most receptions (112) and receiving yards (1,860) in 2013.
